text: ovun veta (apage) dutayin ovunta idiriyen ha pasupasin pæmina (ovunta) “allah hæra (an) kisivak oba nonamadinu” (yayi pævasimata) ovun “apage deviyan (ættenma apata dutayeku yævimata) adahas kale nam, ohu malayikavarunvama (dutayin vasayen) pahala karannata ida tibuni. ebævin niyata vasayenma api oba gena a duta mehevara pratiksepa karannemu” yayi pævasuha
